name: mcp-s3
description: MCP server for Amazon S3 and S3-compatible object storage. Enables AI assistants to list buckets, browse objects, and read/write files in S3.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key ID for authentication

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret access key for authentication

AWS_PROFILE.description: AWS profile name from credentials file

S3_ENDPOINT.description: Custom S3 endpoint URL (for S3-compatible storage like MinIO, SeaweedFS)

S3_USE_PATH_STYLE.description: Use path-style URLs instead of virtual-hosted style (required for most S3-compatible storage)

MCP_S3_EXT_READONLY.description: Block write operations (put, delete) for safety
